About Me

My name is Kathy Sha and I am currently a third year computer science and design major at Northeastern University. I am passionate about frontend and software development work, and currently working on the web development team at Northeastern's Generate student-led product development studio. I would love to expand my horizons to positions and projects looking into software development and design.
